snippet: A new title maybe, but there is no chance of Andy Murray getting ahead of himself this week at the ATP World Tour Finals -- especially with Ivan Lendl in his corner....
lead_paragraph: A new title maybe, but there is no chance of Andy Murray getting ahead of himself this week at the ATP World Tour Finals -- especially with Ivan Lendl in his corner.

headline.print_headline: Business as Usual for New Top Dog Murray
headline.main: Business as Usual for New Top Dog Murray
